short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Availability notifications and automatic cart reservation of BC Parks Campsites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When the space becomes available, the extension will put it to the cart (thus, securing it for 15 minutes) and send you a notification.

Note: the extension does not book the camping for you, it only places it to your shopping cart.
